description: A collection of circles in a tall, roughly triangular formation atop a wide rectangular formation of circles. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a thin, pale blue triangle in the center of the triangular formation and another thin, pale blue triangle in the bottom right corner; there is also a dark purplish-pink triangle to the right of the center of the rectangular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
